aboute-me.title: Who I Am
aboute-me.subtitle: About me
aboute-me.intro: As a frontend developer based in Viernheim, I am passionate about the diversity within IT. With great enthusiasm, I design modern and user-friendly websites and applications that stand out with their clean aesthetics and intuitive usability.
aboute-me.first: I am flexible when it comes to the workplace and deliver top performance both in the direct vicinity of Viernheim, Mannheim, Heidelberg, as well as remotely.
aboute-me.second: I am open to new challenges and always looking for opportunities to continuously improve my knowledge and skills.
aboute-me.third: For me, programming is much more than just writing code – it's a creative way to solve problems. I place great importance on translating complex technical challenges into clear and user-friendly solutions. This way, I help you achieve your goals and bring your ideas to life.

feedback.e_henriks: It's always a pleasure to work with Samuel. He is not only talented in programming but also a team player, always willing to share his knowledge and support others.
